content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0) with coal fuel
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Electric pole network connecting various entities

### Iron Production Line 1
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Iron Production Line 2
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Coal Mining Setup
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Automation Science Pack Production
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for material movement
- Connected belt groups for material transport
- Stone furnace at (14.0, 14.0)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Always verify item existence in chest before attempting extraction
- Check chest inventory contents before attempting to extract items
- Implement proper error handling for cases when items are not available

### Power-related issues
- Ensure boilers are consistently fueled to maintain power generation
- Monitor power consumption and generation to prevent production stoppages
- Keep coal supply steady for power-generating equipment

### Production line material shortages
- Maintain adequate supply of raw materials (copper plates, iron gear wheels)
- Monitor input chest inventory levels
- Ensure proper material flow through the production chain

### Entity placement and connection issues
- Verify all production line components are properly connected
- Ensure inserters are correctly oriented for pickup and drop-off
- Check that belt systems are properly aligned and connected
